item.description:
Yes, I've decided to take our founder's name in vain in hopes it might provoke him into dropping in for a meeting.

It's a ways off, but October 6th is the first day we can get everyone.

In particular, it's the first day we can get both Cindy and Jamie, who are providing our reading material for next time and it seems only sporting to have them there when we're talking about their stories. Stories that are, in fact, already posted, so we've got lots of time to read and comment.

Hope everyone's having a good month.

See you in a few weeks!

Rudi
item.name: Wow! It's almost Halloween and I've barely started building my wickerChang!
